93408.text: kube-apiserver: jsonpath expressions with consecutive recursive descent operators are no longer evaluated for custom resource printer columns
93408.markdown: Kube-apiserver: jsonpath expressions with consecutive recursive descent operators are no longer evaluated for custom resource printer columns ([#93408](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/93408), [@joelsmith](https://github.com/joelsmith)) [SIG API Machinery]
93408.author: joelsmith

93442.text: EndpointSliceMirroring controller now copies labels from Endpoints to EndpointSlices.
93442.markdown: EndpointSliceMirroring controller now copies labels from Endpoints to EndpointSlices. ([#93442](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/93442), [@robscott](https://github.com/robscott)) [SIG Apps and Network]
93442.author: robscott

93570.text: kube-apiserver: the componentstatus API is deprecated. This API provided status of etcd, kube-scheduler, and kube-controller-manager components, but only worked when those components were local to the API server, and when kube-scheduler and kube-controller-manager exposed unsecured health endpoints. Instead of this API, etcd health is included in the kube-apiserver health check and kube-scheduler/kube-controller-manager health checks can be made directly against those components' health endpoints.
93570.markdown: Kube-apiserver: the componentstatus API is deprecated. This API provided status of etcd, kube-scheduler, and kube-controller-manager components, but only worked when those components were local to the API server, and when kube-scheduler and kube-controller-manager exposed unsecured health endpoints. Instead of this API, etcd health is included in the kube-apiserver health check and kube-scheduler/kube-controller-manager health checks can be made directly against those components' health endpoints. ([#93570](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/93570), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt)) [SIG API Machinery, Apps and Cluster Lifecycle]
93570.author: liggitt

93600.text: A panic in the apiserver caused by the `informer-sync` health checker is now fixed.
93600.markdown: A panic in the apiserver caused by the `informer-sync` health checker is now fixed. ([#93600](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/93600), [@ialidzhikov](https://github.com/ialidzhikov)) [SIG API Machinery]
93600.author: ialidzhikov
